TITLE: Wellness And Mindfulness
DEF: Promoting mental, emotional, and physical well-being in the learning environment.
TASK: The Wellness and Mindfulness pattern promotes mental, emotional, and physical well-being within the learning environment. This pattern handles common issues such as stress, burnout, and focus loss by incorporating mindfulness practices, stress management techniques, and self-care strategies. By fostering a balanced and healthy lifestyle, students can enhance their overall academic performance and well-being.
